word: I am now called upon to present a similar message to our churches.  Our aged ministering brethren are not to be over-taxed, but when they are at any of our churches, those in the church should remember that it is always courteous to ask them to speak.  It is only showing these brethren the respect due them to say, "Brethren, you are older in the faith than we are.  Have you not the word of the Lord for us at this time?"
